profile.name: Dominik Dorfmeister
profile.headline: Senior Software Engineer at Fair Isaac | Open Source Enthusiast
profile.summary: Highly motivated and experienced software engineer with a passion for building scalable, performant, and maintainable applications. Proficient in React, TypeScript, and various utility libraries. Always looking to improve my skills and contribute to the open-source community.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer at Fair Isaac
description: Designed and implemented caching solutions for high-traffic applications using react-query-beyond-the-basics and pkg.pr.new.
Developed and maintained the performance optimization strategy for our flagship product, resulting in a 30% increase in user engagement.

experience.title: Freelance Developer
description: Contributed to the development of TanStack/query and react-query, demonstrating expertise in state management and schema validation.
Built and maintained multiple open-source projects, including a popular utility library for React applications.

experience.title: Open Source Maintainer
description: Maintained the TanStack/query repository, ensuring its continued stability and security.
Collaborated with other maintainers to develop new features and improve the overall user experience.
